sentences: This session was held from 9-10 April 2008 in Budapest, Hungary, with discussions centering on the future of the IPCC, including key aspects of its work programme such as WG structure, main type and timing of future reports, and the future structure of the IPCC Bureau and the TFB.
The IPCC agreed to prepare the AR5 and to retain the current structure of its WGs.

In order to enable significant use of new scenarios in the AR5, the Panel requested the Bureau to ensure delivery of the WG I report by early 2013 and completion of the other WG reports and the SYR at the earliest feasible date in 2014.
The Panel also agreed to prepare a Special Report on renewable energy to be completed by 2010.
